Notes: A pair of large gate doors that can be unlocked by activating a switch or by triggering its special cutscene nerve action.

SW_A.Description: If used, the gate will be opened when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the switch gets activated after the gate opens through activating SW_A.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Its special cutscene nerve action opens the gate.
